sentences.en: she clocks off to go home.
sentences.cn: 她打卡下班回家。

sentences.en: “Immense linemen declared their intentions to clean the clocks of opposing players”(&b{Russell Baker})
sentences.cn: “优秀的前锋队员们声称要努力彻底打败对手”(&b{拉塞尔·巴克})

sentences.en: A wind-up clock ticked busily from the kitchen counter.
sentences.cn: 一只上了弦的钟在厨房的案子上嘀嗒响个不停。

sentences.en: As the town clock struck two, they heard the roll of drums.
sentences.cn: 当小镇的时钟敲响两点钟时，他们听到了隆隆的鼓声。

sentences.en: At 240 mph the needle went off the clock.
sentences.cn: 车速达到每小时240英里时，里程表上的指针显示超出了最高时速。

sentences.en: At seven o'clock the night nurse came in to relieve her.
sentences.cn: 7点钟的时候夜班护士来接她的班。

sentences.en: By eight o'clock he had arrived at my hotel.
sentences.cn: 到8点时，他已经到达我住的宾馆了。

sentences.en: Eve, squinting at the clock, saw it was just on 7 a.m.
sentences.cn: 伊夫眯着眼瞥了一下钟，看到差不多是早上7点钟。

sentences.en: For a few minutes she sat on her bed watching the clock.
sentences.cn: 她坐在床上盯着时钟看了几分钟。

sentences.en: He sat listening to the tick of the grandfather clock.
sentences.cn: 他坐在那儿，听着落地式大摆钟嘀嗒作响。

sentences.en: He stole a glance at the clock behind her.
sentences.cn: 他偷偷地看了一眼她背后的钟。

sentences.en: I heard the clock strike six (= make six loud sounds ) .
sentences.cn: 我听到钟敲了六下。

sentences.en: I've got a team working around the clock.
sentences.cn: 我手下有一组人日夜工作。

sentences.en: It was just gone 7 o'clock this evening when I finished.
sentences.cn: 今晚我做完的时候刚过7点。

sentences.en: Outside, Bruce glanced at his watch: "Dear me, nearly oneo'clock."
sentences.cn: 出了门，布鲁斯瞥了一眼自己的手表，“天哪，快一点了。”

sentences.en: Rescue services have been working round the clock to free stranded motorists.
sentences.cn: 救援部门一直在日夜不停地工作，解救被困司机。

sentences.en: She should be back by ten o'clock at the latest.
sentences.cn: 她最晚应该在10点前回来。

sentences.en: staff should clock in on arrival.
sentences.cn: 员工到达时应打卡记时。

sentences.en: The Night Duty Officer was ready to clock off.
sentences.cn: 值夜班的警员准备打卡下班。

sentences.en: The station clock was ten minutes slow (= showed a time ten minutes earlier than the real time ) .
sentences.cn: 车站的钟慢了十分钟。

sentences.en: They arrived to clock on and found the factory gates locked.
sentences.cn: 他们到了工厂准备打卡上班，却发现大门没开。

时光倒流，回到从前；守旧规

trans.tran_en: an instrument that shows what time it is, in a room or outside on a building
an instrument that shows what time it is, in a room or outside on a building

trans.tran_cn: 达到（某时间或速度） ，为…计时/测速，注意到
trans.tran_en: to measure or record the time or speed that someone or something is travelling at
